info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal

Class DoAnyTaskRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal.GoalRule
      • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal.TaskRule
        • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal.DoAnyTaskRule

  • @Entity
public class DoAnyTaskRule
extends TaskRule
    A DoAnyTaskRule defines a task rule by which only one of all mentioned tasks have to be fulfilled. If is this task is finsihed the goal rule an so the associated goal is completed.

    • Method Detail

      • getCompletedTasks

        public List<Task> getCompletedTasks(List<FinishedTask> finishedPlayerTasks,
                                    LocalDateTime lastDate)
        Gets the tasks of a DoAnyTaskRule that are already finished. So the user gets a status which tasks she/he dosen't have to complete any more. Therefore a list of finished tasks that were done by a specific player is filtered if they already needed for this rule. If a task was done and is needed for fulfilling the rule it is added to a list.
        Parameters:
        finishedPlayerTasks - The list of all tasks a specific player has already done.
        lastDate - Optionally a date can be passed. If it isn't null all tasks after this date are checked.
        Returns:
        The list of already completed tasks of a task rule.

      • getUncompletedTasks

        public List<Task> getUncompletedTasks(List<FinishedTask> finishedPlayerTasks,
                                      LocalDateTime lastDate)
        Gets the tasks of a DoAnyTaskRule that are not finished yet. So the user gets a status which tasks she/he can complete for fulfilling this rule. Therefore a list of finished tasks that were done by a specific player is filtered if they needed for this rule. If a task wasn't already done and is needed for fulfilling the rule it is added to a list.
        Parameters:
        finishedPlayerTasks - The list of all tasks a specific player has already done.
        lastDate - The date after all tasks are checked if they were completed in this period of time.
        Returns:
        A list of missing tasks which have to be completed until the task rule is fulfilled.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Task task)
        This method checks if a rule contains a specific task. If the task is defined in the rule it returns true otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        task - The task which has to be checked.
        Returns:
        The boolean value if the task is contained in the task rule (true) or not (false).

      • checkRule

        public boolean checkRule(List<FinishedTask> finishedPlayerTasks,
                         LocalDateTime lastDate)
        This method checks if a DoAnyTaskRule is fulfilled. Therefore the list of all already finished tasks is checked if all needed tasks are in this list. If they are, they are added to a list. In the end it is checked if at least one task of the rule is completed. If it does, true is returned otherwise false is returned.
        Specified by:
        checkRule in class TaskRule
        Parameters:
        finishedPlayerTasks - The list of already finished tasks a player has already completed.
        lastDate - Optionally a date can be passed. If it isn't null all tasks after this date are checked.
        Returns:
        The boolean value if a rule is fulfilled (true) or not(false).

      • getProgress

        public Progress getProgress(List<FinishedTask> finishedPlayerTasks,
                            LocalDateTime lastDate)
        Returns the progress of the task rule. This progress is represented by the number of the already finished tasks and the number of tasks which has to be completed for fulfilling this rule.
        Specified by:
        getProgress in class TaskRule
        Parameters:
        finishedPlayerTasks - The number of finished tasks a player has already completed. This list is checked which tasks are needed for the rule.
        lastDate - Optionally a date can be passed. If it isn't null all tasks after this date are checked.
        Returns:
        The progress of the rule dependent on it's type different values of the progress are returned.
